Decent Work and Economic Growth.reason: Mentions multinational environment and careers in accounting/finance; supports economic growth and employment pathways.
evidence: Based on the trend that more and more companies operate in a multinational environment, it is essential to grasp a solid understanding on merger and acquisition and related accounting issues.
The primary objective of this course is to prepare students with advanced knowledge and understanding about the issues related to consolidation of financial statements.
The course seeks to prepare students for careers in both private and public accounting, finance, and business consulting.
